headline: GE Aerospace’s Singapore Bet Tests Growth Versus Rich Valuation
summary: GE Aerospace (NYSE:GE) is committing a multi year US$300 million investment to upgrade its Singapore repair hub. The project focuses on advanced automation, AI, and digital technologies to support jet engine repair operations. The upgraded facility is aimed at increasing capacity and reducing turnaround times for airline customers. For you as an investor, this move sits at the intersection of GE Aerospace's core jet engine business and the aviation sector's growing maintenance needs. The...
